meanings.definition: a person who earns money to support a family
meanings.sent1: The breadwinner in our family works hard to provide for us.
meanings.sent2: She is the breadwinner of the family, working long hours to make ends meet.
meanings.sent3: The breadwinner joked that their wallet was on a diet from all the spending.
meanings.sent4: Being the breadwinner can sometimes feel like carrying the weight of the world on your shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The breadwinner's dedication to their job is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: the main source of income for a household
meanings.sent1: In many families, the breadwinner is the one who brings home the paycheck.
meanings.sent2: Losing his job meant losing the breadwinner for the household.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected bonus turned out to be a pleasant surprise for the household's breadwinner.
meanings.sent4: The stability of a job can make a breadwinner feel secure in their role.
meanings.sent5: The breadwinner's income is crucial for the family's well-being.
